scenario_text.value: This isn’t right either... Man, what gives?
I can’t believe I’m lost.

(For me it was just a few hours, but a whole
month went by in this world.)

(I wonder if the geography’s different now,
because I don’t have my bearings back yet.)
Huh?! N-no way!

Phew, there you are. What gives, man? I’ve
been looking for you.
Ryo! Did you actually come looking for me?

Well, yeah, of course. I mean, we’re friends,
right?

Now come on, let’s get back to the others.
Try not to get lost, okay?
Ryo...!

(Funny, I don’t remember Ryo being so
capable.)

Hey, snap out of it, would you? We need to
get moving.

Hello? Takuma? You’re acting weird. What’s
up?
(How do I respond to Ryo’s transformation?)
You sure grew up.
You’re cool now!
You’re slayin’ it.
Wow, Ryo, you’ve really grown up.

Huh? What’re you babbling on about? This is
hardly the time for flattery.
Now come on, this way. Let’s go.
(Man, what happened to Ryo this past month?)
Wow, Ryo...you’re really cool now.

Huh? Come on, quit flapping that mouth and
start moving those legs already!
What, no thanks for the compliment?

Look, you let down your guard out here, and
you’ll get taken in for sure.

But I guess...compliments can be nice
sometimes, too.

Ryo, you seem like you must be slayin’ it
with the ladies lately.
What? Don’t be stupid. Listen up, Takuma.

You ease up for a second out here, and that’s
it. Your life is over, okay?
Dude, that was a pretty cool line too!
(Still, if Ryo’s really changed this much...)
What happened while I was away?
A lot. Seriously, a lot. That’s how I know.

We can’t just stand around talking, or we’re
gonna get ambushed for sure.
Ryo...!
